problem.markdown: This activity is optional. Use the image above to answer the question. >>Here’s a selection of Named Release trees, in alphabetical order left to right. From left to right, which do you see?<< [x] Aspen [ ] Birch [x] Aspen [ ] Birch [ ] Cypress [x] Dogwood [ ] Eucalyptus [x] Ginkgo [ ] Hawthorne [ ] Ironwood [ ] Juniper [ ] Koa [ ] Lilac [x] Maple [ ] Nutmeg [ ] Olive [x] Palm [ ] Quince [x] Redwood [x] Dogwood [ ] Eucalyptus [x] Ginkgo [ ] Hawthorne [ ] Ironwood [ ] Juniper [ ] Koa [ ] Lilac [x] Maple [ ] Nutmeg [ ] Olive [x] Palm [ ] Quince [x] Redwood
